About the blog

The purpose of this blog is to document and share my experiences and experiment.

It was created using free technology:

For hosting the site I use Netlify.

For the development Jekyll 4.1+ Tailwind CSS v2.2+ PostCSS 8.3+ and the structure is based on the Jekyll Atlantic theme that I then customized.

This is version number 4.2 of the blog you can check the code in Github
